1.1:
janaka uvaacha 
katham jnyaanamavaapnoti,
katham muktirbhavishyati.
vairaagya cha katham praaptam etad
broohi mama prabho..
1.2:
asht'aavakra uvaacha 
muktim ichchhasi chettaata,
vishayaana vishavattyaja.
kshamaarjavadayaatosha, satyam
peeyooshavad bhaja..
1.3:
na prithvee na jalam naagnirna
vaayurdyaurna vaa bhavaan.
eshaam saakshinamaatmaanam
chidroopam viddhi muktaye..
1.4:
yadi deham prithak kritya
chiti vishraamya tisht'hasi.
adhunaiva sukhee shaanto
bandhamukto bhavishyasi..
1.5:
na tvam vipraadiko varna:
naashramee naakshagochara:.
asangago'si niraakaaro
vishvasaakshee sukhee bhava..
1.6:
dharmaadharmau sukham dukham
maanasaani na te vibho.
na kartaasi na bhoktaasi
mukta evaasi sarvadaa..
1.7:
eko drasht'aasi sarvasya
muktapraayo'si sarvadaa.
ayameva hi te bandho
drasht'aaram pashyaseetaram..
1.8:
aham kartetyahammaana
mahaakrishnaahidamshitah.
naaham karteti vishvaasaamritam
peetvaa sukham bhava..
1.9:
eko vishuddhabodho'ham
iti nishchayavahninaa.
prajvaalyaajnyaanagahanam
veetashokah sukhee bhava..
1.10:
yatra vishvamidam bhaati
kalpitam rajjusarpavat.
aanandaparamaanandah sa
bodhastvam sukham chara..
1.11:
muktaabhimaanee mukto hi
baddho baddhaabhimaanyapi.
kivadanteeha satyeyam
yaa matih saa gatirbhavet..
1.12:
aatmaa saakshee vibhuh
poorna eko muktashchidakriyah.
asango nihsprihah shaanto
bhramaatsamsaaravaaniva..
1.13:
koot'astham bodhamadvaita-
maatmaanam paribhaavaya.
aabhaaso'ham bhramam muktvaa
bhaavam baahyamathaantaram..
1.14:
dehaabhimaanapaashena chiram
baddho'si putraka.
bodho'ham jnyaanakhangena
tannishkritya sukhee bhava..
1.15:
nihsango nishkriyo'si
tvam svaprakaasho niranjanah.
ayameva hi te bandhah
samaadhimanutisht'hati..
1.16:
tvayaa vyaaptamidam vishvam
tvayi protam yathaarthatah.
shuddhabuddhasvarupastvam maa
gamah kshudrachittataam..
1.17:
nirapeksho nirvikaaro
nirbharah sheetalaashayah.
agaadhabuddhirakshubdho bhava
chinmaatravaasana:..
1.18:
saakaaramanritam viddhi
niraakaaram tu nishchalam.
etattattvopadeshena
na punarbhavasambhava:..
1.19:
yathaivaadarshamadhyasthe
roope'ntah paritastu sah.
tathaivaa'smin shareere'ntah
paritah parameshvarah..
1.20:
ekam sarvagatam vyoma
bahirantaryathaa ghat'e.
nityam nirantaram brahma
sarvabhootagane tathaa..
2.1:
janaka uvaacha 
aho niranjanah shaanto
bodho'ham prakriteh parah.
etaavantamaham kaalam
mohenaiva vid'ambitah..
2.2:
yathaa prakaashayaamyeko
dehameno tathaa jagat.
ato mama jagatsarvama-
thavaa na cha kinchana..
2.3:
sashareeramaho vishvam
parityajya mayaa'dhunaa.
kutashchit kaushalaadeva
paramaatmaa vilokyate..
2.4:
yathaa na toyato bhinnaas-
tarangaah phena budabudaah.
aatmano na tathaa bhinnam vishvamaatmavinirgatam ..
2.5:
tantumaatro bhavedeva
pat'o yadvadvichaaritah.
aatmatanmaatramevedam
tadvadvishvam vichaaritam..
2.6:
yathaivekshurase klriptaa
tena vyaaptaiva sharkaraa.
tathaa vishvam mayi klriptam
mayaa vyaaptam nirantaram..
2.7:
aatmaa'jnyaanaajjagadbhaati
aatmajnyaanaanna bhaasate.
rajjavajnyaanaadahirbhaati
tajjnyaanaadbhaasate na hi..
2.8:
prakaasho me nijam roopam
naatirikto'smyaham tatah.
yadaa prakaashate vishvam
tadaa'hambhaasa eva hi..
2.9:
aho vikalpitam
vishvanjnyaanaanmayi bhaasate.
roopyam shuktau phanee rajjau
vaari sooryakare yathaa..
2.10:
matto vinirgatam vishvam
mayyeva layameshyati.
mridi kumbho jale veechih
kanake kat'akam yathaa..
2.11:
aho aham namo mahyam
vinaasho yasya naasti me.
brahmaadistambaparyantam
yagannaasho'pi tisht'hatah..
2.12:
aho aham namo mahyam
eko'ham dehavaanapi.
kvachinna gantaa naagantaa
vyaapya vishvamavasthitah..
2.13:
aho aham namo mahyam
daksho naasteeha matsamah.
asamsprishya shareerena
yena vishvam chiram dhritam..
2.14:
aho aham namo mahyam
yasya me naasti kinchana.
athavaa yasya me sarvam yad
vaangmanasagocharam..
2.15:
jnyaanam jnyeyam tathaa jnyaataa
tritayam naasti vaastavam.
ajnyaanaad bhaati yatredam
so'hamasmi niranjanah..
2.16:
dvaitamoolamaho duhkham naanya-
ttasyaa'sti bheshajam.
drishyametan mrishaa sarvam
eko'ham chidrasomalah..
2.17:
bodhamaatro'hamajnyaanaad
upaadhih kalpito mayaa.
evam vimrishato nityam
nirvikalpe sthitirmama..
2.18:
na me bandho'sti moksho vaa
bhraantih shaanto niraashrayaa.
aho mayi sthitam vishvam
vastuto na mayi sthitam..
2.19:
sashareeramidam vishvam
na kinchiditi nishchitam.
shuddhachinmaatra aatmaa cha
tatkasmin kalpanaadhunaa..
2.20:
shareeram svarganarakau
bandhamokshau bhayam tathaa.
kalpanaamaatramevaitat
kim me kaaryam chidaatmanah..
2.21:
aho janasamoohe'pi
na dvaitam pashyato mama.
aranyamiva samvrittam
kva ratim karavaanyaham..
2.22:
naaham deho na me deho
yeevo naahamaham hi chit.
ayameva hi me bandha
aaseedyaa jeevite sprihaa..
2.23:
aho bhuvanakallolai-
rvichitrairdraak samutthitam.
mayyanantamahaambhodhau
chittavaate samudyate..
2.24:
mayyanantamahaambhodhau
chittavaate prashaamyati.
abhaagyaajjeevavanijo
yagatpoto vinashvarah..
2.25:
mayyanantamahaambhodhaa-
vaashcharyam jeevaveechayah.
udyanti ghnanti khelanti
pravishanti svabhaavatah..
3.1:
asht'aavakra uvaacha 
avinaashinamaatmaanam
ekam vijnyaaya tattvatah.
tavaatmajnyaanasya dheerasya
kathamarthaarjane ratih..
3.2:
aatmaajnyaanaadaho
preetirvishayabhramagochare.
shukterajnyaanato lobho
yathaa rajatavibhrame..
3.3:
vishvam sphurati yatredam
tarangaa iva saagare.
so'hamasmeeti vijnyaaya
kim deena iva dhaavasi..
3.5:
sarvabhooteshu chaatmaanam
sarvabhootaani chaatmani.
munerjaanata aashcharyam
mamatvamanuvartate..
3.6:
aasthitah paramaadvaitam
mokshaarthe'pi vyavasthitah.
aashcharyam kaamavashago
vikalah kelishikshayaa..
3.7:
udbhootam jnyaanadurmitrama-
vadhaaryaatidurbalah.
aashcharyam kaamamaakaankshet kaalamantamanushritah..
3.8:
ihaamutra viraktasya nityaanityavivekinah.
aashcharyam mokshakaamasya
mokshaad eva vibheeshikaa..
3.9:
dheerastu bhojyamaano'pi peed'yamaano'pi sarvadaa.
aatmaanam kevalam pashyan
na tushyati na kupyati..
3.10:
chesht'amaanam shareeram svam pashyatyanyashareeravat.
samstave chaapi nindaayaam
katham kshubhyet mahaashayah..
3.11:
maayaamaatramidam vishvam
pashyan vigatakautukah.
api sannihite mrityau
katham trasyati dheeradheeh..
3.12:
nihspriham maanasam yasya
nairaashye'pi mahaatmanah.
tasyaatmajnyaanatriptasya
tulanaa kena jaayate..
3.13:
svabhaavaad eva jaanaano
drishyametanna kinchana.
idam graahyamidam tyaajyam
sa kim pashyati dheeradheeh..
3.14:
antastyaktakashaayasya
nirdvandvasya niraashishah.
yadrichchhayaagato bhogo
na duhkhaaya na tusht'aye..
4.1:
asht'aavakra uvaacha 
hantaatmajnyasya dheerasya
khelato bhogaleelayaa.
na hi samsaaravaaheekai-
rmood'haih saha samaanataa..
4.2:
yat padam prepsavo deenaah
shakraadyaah sarvadevataah.
aho tatra sthito yogee na
harshamupagachchhati..
4.3:
tajjnyasya punyapaapaabhyaam
sparsho hyantarna jaayate.
na hyaakaashasya dhoomena
drishyamaanaapi sangatih..
4.4:
aatmaivedam jagatsarvam
nyaatam yena mahaatmanaa.
yadrichchhayaa vartamaanam
tam nisheddhum kshameta kah..
4.5:
aabrahmastambaparyante
bhootagraame chaturvidhe.
vijnyasyaiva hi saamarthya-
michchhaanichchhaavivarjane..
4.6:
aatmaanamadvayam kashchij-
yaanaati jagadeeshvaram.
yad vetti tatsa kurute
na bhayam tasya kutrachit..
5.1:
asht'aavakra uvaacha 
na te sango'sti kenaapi
kim shuddhastyaktumichchhasi.
sanghaatavilayam kurvan-
nevameva layam vraja..
5.2:
udeti bhavato vishvam
vaaridheriva budbudah.
iti jnyaatvaikamaatmaanam
evameva layam vraja..
5.3:
pratyakshamapyavastutvaad
vishvam naastyamale tvayi.
rajjusarpa iva vyaktam
evameva layam vraja..
5.4:
samaduhkhasukhah poorna
aashaanairaashyayoh samah.
samajeevitamrityuh san-
nevameva layam vraja..
6.1:
asht'aavakra uvaacha 
aakaashavadananto'ham
ghat'avat praakritam jagat.
iti jnyaanam tathaitasya
na tyaago na graho layah..
6.2:
mahodadhirivaaham sa
prapancho veechisa'nnibhah.
iti jnyaanam tathaitasya
na tyaago na graho layah..
6.3:
aham sa shuktisankaasho
roopyavad vishvakalpanaa.
iti jnyaanam tathaitasya
na tyaago na graho layah..
6.4:
aham vaa sarvabhooteshu
sarvabhootaanyatho mayi.
iti jnyaanam tathaitasya
na tyaago na graho layah..
7.1:
mayyanantamahaambhodhau
vishvapota itastatah.
bhramati svaantavaatena na
mamaastyasahishnutaa..
7.2:
mayyanantamahaambhodhau
yagadveechih svabhaavatah.
udetu vaastamaayaatu
na me vriddhirna cha kshatih..
7.3:
mayyanantamahaambhodhau
vishvam naama vikalpanaa.
atishaanto niraakaara
etadevaahamaasthitah..
7.4:
naatmaa bhaaveshu no bhaavas-
tatraanante niranjane.
ityasakto'sprihah shaanta etadevaahamaasthitah..
7.5:
aho chinmaatramevaaham
indrajaalopamam jagat.
ato mama katham kutra heyopaadeyakalpanaa..
8.1:
asht'aavakra uvaacha 
tadaa bandho yadaa chittam
kinchid vaanchhati shochati.
kinchin munchati grinhaati
kinchid hrishyati kupyati..
8.2:
tadaa muktiryadaa chittam
na vaanchhati na shochati.
na munchati na grinhaati
na hrishyati na kupyati..
8.3:
tadaa bandho yadaa chittam
saktam kaashvapi drisht'ishu.
tadaa moksho yadaa chittama-
saktam sarvadrisht'ishu..
8.4:
yadaa naaham tadaa moksho
yadaaham bandhanam tadaa.
matveti helayaa kinchin-
maa grihaana vimuncha maa..
9.1:
asht'aavakra uvaacha 
kritaakrite cha dvandvaani
kadaa shaantaani kasya vaa.
evam jnyaatveha nirvedaad bhava
tyaagaparo'vratee..
9.2:
kasyaapi taata dhanyasya lokachesht'aavalokanaat.
yeevitechchhaa bubhukshaa cha
bubhutsopashamam gataah..
9.3:
anityam sarvamevedam
taapatrayadooshitam.
asaaram ninditam heyami-
ti nishchitya shaamyati..
9.4:
ko'sau kaalo vayah kim vaa
yatra dvandvaani no nrinaam.
taanyupekshya yathaapraaptavartee
siddhimavaapnuyaat..
9.5:
naanaa matam maharsheenaam
saadhoonaam yoginaam tathaa.
drisht'vaa nirvedamaapannah
ko na shaamyati maanavah..
9.6:
kritvaa moortiparijnyaanam
chaitanyasya na kim guruh.
nirvedasamataayuktyaa
yastaarayati samsriteh..
9.7:
pashya bhootavikaaraamstvam
bhootamaatraan yathaarthatah.
tatkshanaad bandhanirmuktah
svaroopastho bhavishyasi..
9.8:
vaasanaa eva samsaara iti
sarvaa vimuncha taah.
tattyaago vaasanaatyaagaa-
tsthitiradya yathaa tathaa..
10.1:
asht'aavakra uvaacha 
vihaaya vairinam kaamama-
rtham chaanarthasankulam.
dharmamapyetayorhetum
sarvatraanaadaram kuru..
10.2:
svapnendrajaalavat pashya
dinaani treeni pancha vaa.
mitrakshetradhanaagaara-
daaradaayaadisampadah..
10.3:
yatra yatra bhavettrishnaa
samsaaram viddhi tatra vai.
praud'havairaagyamaashritya
veetatrishnah sukhee bhava..
10.4:
trishnaamaatraatmako bandhas-
tannaasho moksha uchyate.
bhavaasamsaktimaatrena praaptitusht'irmuhurmuhuh..
10.5:
tvamekashchetanah shuddho
yad'am vishvamasattathaa.
avidyaapi na kinchitsaa
kaa bubhutsaa tathaapi te..
10.6:
raajyam sutaah kalatraani
shareeraani sukhaani cha.
samsaktasyaapi nasht'aani
tava janmani janmani..
10.7:
alamarthena kaamena
sukritenaapi karmanaa.
ebhyah samsaarakaantaare
na vishraantamabhoon manah..
10.8:
kritam na kati janmaani
kaayena manasaa giraa.
duhkhamaayaasadam karma
tadadyaapyuparamyataam..
11.1:
asht'aavakra uvaacha 
bhaavaabhaavavikaarashcha
svabhaavaaditi nishchayee.
nirvikaaro gatakleshah
sukhenaivopashaamyati..
11.2:
eeshvarah sarvanirmaataa
nehaanya iti nishchayee.
antargalitasarvaashah shaantah
kvaapi na sajjate..
11.3:
aapadah sampadah kaale
daivaadeveti nishchayee.
triptah svasthendriyo nityam
na vaanchhati na shochati..
11.4:
sukhaduhkhe janmamrityoo
daivaadeveti nishchayee.
saadhyaadarshee niraayaasah
kurvannapi na lipyate..
11.5:
chintayaa jaayate duhkham
naanyatheheti nishchayee.
tayaa heenah sukhee shaantah
sarvatra galitasprihah..
11.6:
naaham deho na me deho
bodho'hamiti nishchayee.
kaivalyam iva sampraapto
na smaratyakritam kritam..
11.7:
aabrahmastambaparyantam
ahameveti nishchayee.
nirvikalpah shuchih shaantah praaptaapraaptavinirvritah..
11.8:
naashcharyamidam vishvam
na kinchiditi nishchayee.
nirvaasanah sphoortimaatro
na kinchidiva shaamyati..
12.1:
kaayakrityaasahah poorvam
tato vaagvistaraasahah.
atha chintaasahastasmaad evamevaahamaasthitah..
12.2:
preetyabhaavena shabdaadera-
drishyatvena chaatmanah.
vikshepaikaagrahridaya
evamevaahamaasthitah..
12.3:
samaadhyaasaadivikshiptau
vyavahaarah samaadhaye.
evam vilokya niyamam
evamevaahamaasthitah..
12.4:
heyopaadeyavirahaad
evam harshavishaadayoh.
abhaavaadadya he brahmann
evamevaahamaasthitah..
12.5:
aashramaanaashramam dhyaanam
chittasveekritavarjanam.
vikalpam mama veekshyai-
tairevamevaahamaasthitah..
12.6:
karmaanusht'haanamajnyaanaad
yathaivoparamastathaa.
budhvaa samyagidam tattvam
evamevaahamaasthitah..
12.7:
achintyam chintyamaano'pi
chintaaroopam bhajatyasau.
tyaktvaa tadbhaavanam tasmaad evamevaahamaasthitah..
12.8:
evameva kritam yena sa
kritaartho bhavedasau.
evameva svabhaavo yah
sa kritaartho bhavedasau..
13.1:
janaka uvaacha-
akinchanabhavam svaasthyam
kaupeenatve'pi durlabham.
tyaagaadaane vihaayaasmaada-
hamaase yathaasukham..
13.2:
kutraapi khedah kaayasya
yihvaa kutraapi khedyate.
manah kutraapi tattyaktvaa
purushaarthe sthitah sukham..
13.3:
kritam kimapi naiva syaad
iti sanchintya tattvatah.
yadaa yatkartumaayaati tat
kritvaase yathaasukham..
13.4:
karmanaishkarmyanirbandha-
bhaavaa dehasthayoginah.
samyogaayogavirahaadaha-
maase yathaasukham..
13.5:
arthaanarthau na me sthityaa
gatyaa na shayanena vaa.
tisht'han gachchhan svapan
tasmaadahamaase yathaasukham..
13.6:
svapato naasti me haanih siddhiryatnavato na vaa.
naashollaasau vihaayaas-
madahamaase yathaasukham..
13.7:
sukhaadiroopaa niyamam
bhaaveshvaalokya bhoorishah.
shubhaashubhe vihaayaasmaadaha-
maase yathaasukham..
14.1:
prakrityaa shoonyachitto yah
pramaadaad bhaavabhaavanah.
nidrito bodhita iva ksheena-
samsmarano hi sah..
14.2:
kva dhanaani kva mitraani
kva me vishayadasyavah.
kva shaastram kva cha vijnyaanam
yadaa me galitaa sprihaa..
14.3:
vijnyaate saakshipurushe
paramaatmani cheshvare.
nairaashye bandhamokshe cha
na chintaa muktaye mama..
14.4:
antarvikalpashoonyasya
bahih svachchhandachaarinah.
bhraantasyeva dashaastaastaas-
taadrishaa eva jaanate..
15.1:
asht'aavakra uvaacha 
yathaatathopadeshena kritaarthah sattvabuddhimaan.
aajeevamapi jijnyaasuh
parastatra vimuhyati..
15.2:
moksho vishayavairasyam
bandho vaishayiko rasah.
etaavadeva vijnyaanam
yathechchhasi tathaa kuru..
15.3:
vaagmipraajnyaamahodyogam
yanam mookajad'aalasam.
karoti tattvabodho'yama-
tastyakto bubhukshabhih..
15.4:
na tvam deho na te deho bhoktaa
kartaa na vaa bhavaan.
chidroopo'si sadaa saakshee
nirapekshah sukham chara..
15.5:
raagadveshau manodharmau
na manaste kadaachana.
nirvikalpo'si bodhaatmaa
nirvikaarah sukham chara..
15.6:
sarvabhooteshu chaatmaanam
sarvabhootaani chaatmani.
vijnyaaya nirahankaaro
nirmamastvam sukhee bhava..
15.7:
vishvam sphurati yatredam
tarangaa iva saagare.
tattvameva na sandeha-
shchinmoorte vijvaro bhava..
15.8:
shraddhasva taata shraddhasva
naatra mo'ham kurushva bhoh.
nyaanasvaroopo bhagavaa-
naatmaa tvam prakriteh parah..
15.9:
gunaih samvesht'ito deha-
stisht'hatyaayaati yaati cha.
aatmaa na gantaa naagantaa
kimenamanushochasi..
15.10:
dehastisht'hatu kalpaantam
gachchhatvadyaiva vaa punah.
kva vriddhih kva cha vaa haanis-
tava chinmaatraroopinah..
15.11:
tvayyanantamahaambhodhau
vishvaveechih svabhaavatah.
udetu vaastamaayaatu na te
vriddhirna vaa kshatih..
15.12:
taata chinmaatraroopo'si na
te bhinnamidam jagat.
atah kasya katham kutra
heyopaadeyakalpanaa..
15.13:
ekasminnavyaye shaante chidaakaashe'male tvayi.
kuto janma kuto karma
kuto'hankaara eva cha..
15.14:
yattvam pashyasi tatraikas-
tvameva pratibhaasase.
kim prithak bhaasate svarnaat
kat'akaangadanoopuram..
15.15:
ayam so'hamayam naaham
vibhaagamiti santyaja.
sarvamaatmeti nishchitya
nihsankalpah sukhee bhava..
15.16:
tavaivaajnyaanato vishvam
tvamekah paramaarthatah.
tvatto'nyo naasti samsaaree
naasamsaaree cha kashchana..
15.17:
bhraantimaatramidam vishvam
na kinchiditi nishchayee.
nirvaasanah sphoortimaatro
na kinchidiva shaamyati..
15.18:
eka eva bhavaambhodhaa-
vaaseedasti bhavishyati.
na te bandho'sti moksho vaa krityakrityah sukham chara..
15.19:
maa sankalpavikalpaabhyaam
chittam kshobhaya chinmaya.
upashaamya sukham tisht'ha
svaatmanyaanandavigrahe..
15.20:
tyajaiva dhyaanam sarvatra
maa kinchid hridi dhaaraya.
aatmaa tvam mukta evaasi
kim vimrishya karishyasi..
16.1:
asht'aavakra uvaacha 
aachakshva shrinu vaa taata
naanaashaastraanyanekashah.
tathaapi na tava svaasthyam
sarvavismaranaad rite..
16.2:
bhogam karma samaadhim vaa
kuru vijnya tathaapi te.
chittam nirastasarvaashaama-
tyartham rochayishyati..
16.3:
aayaasaatsakalo duhkhee
nainam jaanaati kashchana.
anenaivopadeshena dhanyah
praapnoti nirvritim..
16.4:
vyaapaare khidyate yastu
nimeshonmeshayorapi.
tasyaalasya dhureenasya
sukham nanyasya kasyachit..
16.5:
idam kritamidam neti
dvandvairmuktam yadaa manah.
dharmaarthakaamamoksheshu
nirapeksham tadaa bhavet..
16.6:
virakto vishayadvesht'aa
raagee vishayalolupah.
grahamokshaviheenastu
na virakto na raagavaan..
16.7:
heyopaadeyataa taavat-
samsaaravit'apaankurah.
sprihaa jeevati yaavad vai
nirvichaaradashaaspadam..
16.8:
pravrittau jaayate raago
nirvrittau dvesha eva hi.
nirdvandvo baalavad dheemaan
evameva vyavasthitah..
16.9:
haatumichchhati samsaaram
raagee duhkhajihaasayaa.
veetaraago hi nirduhkhas-
tasminnapi na khidyati..
16.10:
yasyaabhimaano mokshe'pi
dehe'pi mamataa tathaa.
na cha jnyaanee na vaa yogee
kevalam duhkhabhaagasau..
16.11:
haro yadyupadesht'aa te harih
kamalajo'pi vaa.
tathaapi na tava svaathyam
sarvavismaranaadrite..
17.1:
asht'aavakra uvaacha 
tena jnyaanaphalam praaptam
yogaabhyaasaphalam tathaa.
triptah svachchhendriyo nityam
ekaakee ramate tu yah..
17.2:
na kadaachijjagatyasmin
tattvajnyaa hanta khidyati.
yata ekena tenedam
poornam brahmaand'amand'alam..
17.3:
na jaatu vishayaah ke'pi
svaaraamam harshayantyamee.
sallakeepallavapreeta-
mivebham nimbapallavaah..
17.4:
yastu bhogeshu bhukteshu
na bhavatyadhivaasitaa.
abhukteshu niraakaankshee
tadrisho bhavadurlabhah..
17.5:
bubhukshuriha samsaare
mumukshurapi drishyate.
bhogamokshaniraakaankshee
viralo hi mahaashayah..
17.6:
dharmaarthakaamamoksheshu
yeevite marane tathaa.
kasyaapyudaarachittasya
heyopaadeyataa na hi..
17.7:
vaanchhaa na vishvavilaye
na dveshastasya cha sthitau.
yathaa jeevikayaa tasmaad
dhanya aaste yathaa sukham..
17.8:
kritaartho'nena jnyaanene-
tyevam galitadheeh kritee.
pashyan shrinvan sprishan jighrann
ashnannaste yathaa sukham..
17.9:
shoonyaa drisht'irvrithaa chesht'aa
vikalaaneendriyaani cha.
na sprihaa na viraktirvaa
ksheenasamsaarasaagare..
17.10:
na jagarti na nidraati
nonmeelati na meelati.
aho paradashaa kvaapi
vartate muktachetasah..
17.11:
sarvatra drishyate svasthah
sarvatra vimalaashayah.
samastavaasanaa mukto
muktah sarvatra raajate..
17.12:
pashyan shrinvan sprishan jighrann
ashnan grinhan vadan vrajan.
eehitaaneehitairmukto
mukta eva mahaashayah..
17.13:
na nindati na cha stauti
na hrishyati na kupyati.
na dadaati na grinhaati
muktah sarvatra neerasah..
17.14:
saanuraagaam striyam drisht'vaa
mrityum vaa samupasthitam.
avihvalamanaah svastho
mukta eva mahaashayah..
17.15:
sukhe duhkhe nare naaryaam
sampatsu vipatsu cha.
vishesho naiva dheerasya
sarvatra samadarshinah..
17.16:
na himsaa naiva kaarunyam
nauddhatyam na cha deenataa.
naashcharyam naiva cha kshobhah
ksheenasamsarane nare..
17.17:
na mukto vishayadvesht'aa
na vaa vishayalolupah.
asamsaktamanaa nityam
praaptaapraaptamupaashnute..
17.18:
samaadhaanasamaadhaana-
hitaahitavikalpanaah.
shoonyachitto na jaanaati
kaivalyamiva samsthitah..
17.19:
nirmamo nirahankaaro
na kinchiditi nishchitah.
antargalitasarvaashah
kurvannapi karoti na..
17.20:
manahprakaashasammoha
svapnajaad'yavivarjitah.
dashaam kaamapi sampraapto
bhaved galitamaanasah..
18.1:
asht'aavakra uvaacha 
yasya bodhodaye taavat-
svapnavad bhavati bhramah.
tasmai sukhaikaroopaaya
namah shaantaaya tejase..
18.2:
arjayitvaakhilaan arthaan
bhogaanaapnoti pushkalaan.
na hi sarvaparityaajama-
ntarena sukhee bhavet..
18.3:
kartavyaduhkhamaartand'ajvaalaa
dagdhaantaraatmanah.
kutah prashamapeeyooshadhaaraa-
saaramrite sukham..
18.4:
bhavo'yam bhaavanaamaatro
na kinchit paramarthatah.
naastyabhaavah svabhaavanaam
bhaavaabhaavavibhaavinaam..
18.5:
na dooram na cha sankochaal-
labdhamevaatmanah padam.
nirvikalpam niraayaasam
nirvikaaram niranjanam..
18.7:
samastam kalpanaamaatra-
maatmaa muktah sanaatanah.
iti vijnyaaya dheero hi
kimabhyasyati baalavat..
18.8:
aatmaa brahmeti nishchitya
bhaavaabhaavau cha kalpitau.
nishkaamah kim vijaanaati
kim broote cha karoti kim..
18.9:
ayam so'hamayam naaham
iti ksheenaa vikalpanaa.
sarvamaatmeti nishchitya
tooshneembhootasya yoginah..
18.10:
na vikshepo na chaikaagryam
naatibodho na mood'hataa.
na sukham na cha vaa duhkham
upashaantasya yoginah..
18.11:
svaaraajye bhaikshavrittau cha
laabhaalaabhe jane vane.
nirvikalpasvabhaavasya
na vishesho'sti yoginah..
18.12:
kva dharmah kva cha vaa kaamah
kva chaarthah kva vivekitaa.
idam kritamidam neti
dvandvairmuktasya yoginah..
18.13:
krityam kimapi naivaasti
na kaapi hridi ranjanaa.
yathaa jeevanameveha
yeevanmuktasya yoginah..
18.14:
kva mohah kva cha vaa vishvam
kva tad dhyaanam kva muktataa.
sarvasankalpaseemaayaam
vishraantasya mahaatmanah..
18.15:
yena vishvamidam drisht'am sa
naasteeti karotu vai.
nirvaasanah kim kurute
pashyannapi na pashyati..
18.16:
yena drisht'am param brahma
so'ham brahmeti chintayet.
kim chintayati nishchinto
yo na pashyati..
18.17:
drisht'o yenaatmavikshepo
nirodham kurute tvasau.
udaarastu na vikshiptah
saadhyaabhaavaatkaroti kim..
18.18:
dheero lokaviparyasto
vartamaano'pi lokavat.
no samaadhim na vikshepam
na lopam svasya pashyati..
18.19:
bhaavaabhaavaviheeno yas-
tripto nirvaasano budhah.
naiva kinchitkritam tena
lokadrisht'yaa vikurvataa..
18.20:
pravrittau vaa nivrittau vaa
naiva dheerasya durgrahah.
yadaa yatkartumaayaati
tatkritvaa tisht'hate sukham..
18.21:
nirvaasano niraalambah
svachchhando muktabandhanah.
kshiptah samskaaravaatena
chesht'ate shushkaparnavat..
18.22:
asamsaarasya tu kvaapi
na harsho na vishaaditaa.
sa sheetalahamanaa nityam
videha iva raajaye..
18.23:
kutraapi na jihaasaasti
naasho vaapi na kutrachit.
aatmaaraamasya dheerasya
sheetalaachchhataraatmanah..
18.24:
prakrityaa shoonyachittasya
kurvato'sya yadrichchhayaa.
praakritasyeva dheerasya
na maano naavamaanataa..
18.25:
kritam dehena karmedam
na mayaa shuddharoopinaa.
iti chintaanurodhee yah
kurvannapi karoti na..
18.26:
atadvaadeeva kurute
na bhavedapi baalishah.
yeevanmuktah sukhee shreemaan
samsarannapi shobhate..
18.27:
naavichaarasushraanto dheero
vishraantimaagatah.
na kalpate na jaati
na shrinoti na pashyati..
18.28:
asamaadheravikshepaan
na mumukshurna chetarah.
nishchitya kalpitam pashyan
brahmaivaaste mahaashayah..
18.29:
yasyaantah syaadahankaaro
na karoti karoti sah.
nirahankaaradheerena na
kinchidakritam kritam..
18.30:
nodvignam na cha santusht'a-
makartri spandavarjitam.
niraasham gatasandeham
chittam muktasya raajate..
18.31:
nirdhyaatum chesht'itum vaapi
yachchittam na pravartate.
nirnimittamidam kintu
nirdhyaayeti vichesht'ate..
18.32:
tattvam yathaarthamaakarnya
mandah praapnoti mood'hataam.
athavaa yaati sankochama-
mood'hah ko'pi mood'havat..
18.33:
ekaagrataa nirodho vaa
mood'hairabhyasyate bhrisham.
dheeraah krityam na pashyanti
suptavatsvapade sthitaah..
18.34:
aprayatnaat prayatnaad vaa
mood'ho naapnoti nirvritim.
tattvanishchayamaatrena
praajnyo bhavati nirvritah..
18.35:
shuddham buddham priyam poornam
nishprapancham niraamayam.
aatmaanam tam na jaananti
tatraabhyaasaparaa janaah..
18.36:
naapnoti karmanaa moksham
vimood'ho'bhyaasaroopinaa.
dhanyo vijnyaanamaatrena
muktastisht'hatyavikriyah..
18.37:
mood'ho naapnoti tad brahma
yato bhavitumichchhati.
anichchhannapi dheero hi
parabrahmasvaroopabhaak..
18.38:
niraadhaaraa grahavyagraa
mood'haah samsaaraposhakaah.
etasyaanarthamoolasya
moolachchhedah krito budhaih..
18.39:
na shaantim labhate mood'ho
yatah shamitumichchhati.
dheerastattvam vinishchitya
sarvadaa shaantamaanasah..
18.40:
kvaatmano darshanam tasya
yad drisht'amavalambate.
dheeraastam tam na pashyanti
pashyantyaatmaanamavyayam..
18.41:
kva nirodho vimood'hasya
yo nirbandham karoti vai.
svaaraamasyaiva dheerasya
sarvadaasaavakritrimah..
18.42:
bhaavasya bhaavakah kashchin
na kinchid bhaavakoparah.
ubhayaabhaavakah kashchid
evameva niraakulah..
18.43:
shuddhamadvayamaatmaanam
bhaavayanti kubuddhayah.
na tu jaananti sammohaa-
dyaavajjeevamanirvritaah..
18.44:
mumukshorbuddhiraalamba-
mantarena na vidyate.
niraalambaiva nishkaamaa
buddhirmuktasya sarvadaa..
18.45:
vishayadveepino veekshya
chakitaah sharanaarthinah.
vishanti jhat'iti krod'am
nirodhaikaagrasiddhaye..
18.46:
nirvaasanam harim drisht'vaa
tooshneem vishayadantinah.
palaayante na shaktaaste
sevante kritachaat'avah..
18.47:
na muktikaarikaam dhatte
nihshanko yuktamaanasah.
pashyan shrinvan sprishan
yighrannashnannaaste yathaasukham..
18.48:
vastushravanamaatrena
shuddhabuddhirniraakulah.
naivaachaaramanaachaara-
maudaasyam vaa prapashyati..
18.49:
yadaa yatkartumaayaati
tadaa tatkurute rijuh.
shubham vaapyashubham vaapi
tasya chesht'aa hi baalavat..
18.50:
svaatantryaatsukhamaapnoti
svaatantryaallabhate param.
svaatantryaannirvritim gachchhet-
svaatantryaat paramam padam..
18.51:
akartritvamabhoktritvam
svaatmano manyate yadaa.
tadaa ksheenaa bhavantyeva
samastaashchittavrittayah..
18.52:
uchchhrinkhalaapyakritikaa
sthitirdheerasya raajate.
na tu sasprihachittasya
shaantirmood'hasya kritrimaa..
18.53:
vilasanti mahaabhogai-
rvishanti girigahvaraan.
nirastakalpanaa dheeraa
abaddhaa muktabuddhayah..
18.54:
shrotriyam devataam teerthama-
nganaam bhoopatim priyam.
drisht'vaa sampoojya dheerasya
na kaapi hridi vaasanaa..
18.55:
bhrityaih putraih kalatraishcha
dauhitraishchaapi gotrajaih.
vihasya dhikkrito yogee
na yaati vikritim manaak..
18.56:
santusht'o'pi na santusht'ah
khinno'pi na cha khidyate.
tasyaashcharyadashaam taam
taadrishaa eva jaanate..
18.57:
kartavyataiva samsaaro na
taam pashyanti soorayah.
shoonyaakaaraa niraakaaraa
nirvikaaraa niraamayaah..
18.58:
akurvannapi sankshobhaad
vyagrah sarvatra mood'hadheeh.
kurvannapi tu krityaani
kushalo hi niraakulah..
18.59:
sukhamaaste sukham shete
sukhamaayaati yaati cha.
sukham vakti sukham bhunkte
vyavahaare'pi shaantadheeh..
18.60:
svabhaavaadyasya naivaarti-
rlokavad vyavahaarinah.
mahaahrida ivaakshobhyo
gatakleshah sa shobhate..
18.61:
nivrittirapi mood'hasya
pravritti rupajaayate.
pravrittirapi dheerasya
nivrittiphalabhaaginee..
18.62:
parigraheshu vairaagyam
praayo mood'hasya drishyate.
dehe vigalitaashasya
kva raagah kva viraagataa..
18.63:
bhaavanaabhaavanaasaktaa
drisht'irmood'hasya sarvadaa.
bhaavyabhaavanayaa saa tu
svasthasyaadrisht'iroopinee..
18.64:
sarvaarambheshu nishkaamo
yashchared baalavan munih.
na lepastasya shuddhasya
kriyamaano'pi karmani..
18.65:
sa eva dhanya aatmajnyah
sarvabhaaveshu yah samah.
pashyan shrinvan sprishan jighrann ashnannistarshamaanasah..
18.66:
kva samsaarah kva chaabhaasah
kva saadhyam kva cha saadhanam.
aakaashasyeva dheerasya
nirvikalpasya sarvadaa..
18.67:
sa jayatyarthasamnyaasee
poornasvarasavigrahah.
akritrimo'navachchhinne
samaadhiryasya vartate..
18.68:
bahunaatra kimuktena
nyaatatattvo mahaashayah.
bhogamokshaniraakaankshee
sadaa sarvatra neerasah..
18.69:
mahadaadi jagaddvaitam
naamamaatravijrimbhitam.
vihaaya shuddhabodhasya
kim krityamavashishyate..
18.70:
bhramabhritamidam sarvam
kinchinnaasteeti nishchayee.
alakshyasphuranah shuddhah
svabhaavenaiva shaamyati..
18.71:
shuddhasphuranaroopasya
drishyabhaavamapashyatah.
kva vidhih kva vairaagyam
kva tyaagah kva shamo'pi vaa..
18.72:
sphurato'nantaroopena
prakritim cha na pashyatah.
kva bandhah kva cha vaa mokshah
kva harshah kva vishaaditaa..
18.73:
buddhiparyantasamsaare
maayaamaatram vivartate.
nirmamo nirahankaaro
nishkaamah shobhate budhah..
18.74:
akshayam gatasantaapa-
maatmaanam pashyato muneh.
kva vidyaa cha kva vaa vishvam
kva deho'ham mameti vaa..
18.75:
nirodhaadeeni karmaani
yahaati jad'adheeryadi.
manorathaan pralaapaamshcha
kartumaapnotyatatkshanaat..
18.76:
mandah shrutvaapi tadvastu
na jahaati vimood'hataam.
nirvikalpo bahiryatnaada-
ntarvishayalaalasah..
18.77:
jnyaanaad galitakarmaa
yo lokadrisht'yaapi karmakrit.
naapnotyavasaram karmam
vaktumeva na kinchana..
18.78:
kva tamah kva prakaasho vaa
haanam kva cha na kinchana.
nirvikaarasya dheerasya
niraatankasya sarvadaa..
18.79:
kva dhairyam kva vivekitvam
kva niraatankataapi vaa.
anirvaachyasvabhaavasya
nihsvabhaavasya yoginah..
18.80:
na svargo naiva narako
yeevanmuktirna chaiva hi.
bahunaatra kimuktena
yogadrisht'yaa na kinchana..
18.81:
naiva praarthayate laabham
naalaabhenaanushochati.
dheerasya sheetalam chittama-
mritenaiva pooritam..
18.82:
na shaantam stauti nishkaamo
na dusht'amapi nindati.
samaduhkhasukhastriptah kinchit
krityam na pashyati..
18.83:
dheero na dvesht'i samsaaramaa-
tmaanam na didrikshati.
harshaamarshavinirmukto na
mrito na cha jeevati..
18.84:
nihsnehah putradaaraadau
nishkaamo vishayeshu cha.
nishchintah svashareere'pi
niraashah shobhate budhah..
18.85:
tusht'ih sarvatra dheerasya
yathaapatitavartinah.
svachchhandam charato deshaan
yatrastamitashaayinah..
18.86:
patatoodetu vaa deho naasya
chintaa mahaatmanah.
svabhaavabhoomivishraanti-
vismritaasheshasamsriteh..
18.87:
akinchanah kaamachaaro
nirdvandvashchhinnasamshayah.
asaktah sarvabhaaveshu
kevalo ramate budhah..
18.88:
nirmamah shobhate dheerah
samalosht'aashmakaanchanah.
subhinnahridayagranthi-
rvinirdhootarajastamah..
18.89:
sarvatraanavadhaanasya na
kinchid vaasanaa hridi.
muktaatmano vitriptasya
tulanaa kena jaayate..
18.90:
jaanannapi na jaanaati
pashyannapi na pashyati.
bruvann api na cha broote
ko'nyo nirvaasanaadrite..
18.91:
bhikshurvaa bhoopatirvaapi yo
nishkaamah sa shobhate.
bhaaveshu galitaa yasya
shobhanaashobhanaa matih..
18.92:
kva svaachchhandyam kva sankochah
kva vaa tattvavinishchayah.
nirvyaajaarjavabhootasya
charitaarthasya yoginah..
18.93:
aatmavishraantitriptena
niraashena gataartinaa.
antaryadanubhooyeta tat
katham kasya kathyate..
18.94:
supto'pi na sushuptau cha
svapne'pi shayito na cha.
yaagare'pi na jaagarti
dheerastriptah pade pade..
18.95:
jnyah sachinto'pi nishchintah
sendriyo'pi nirindriyah.
subuddhirapi nirbuddhih
saahankaaro'nahankritih..
18.96:
na sukhee na cha vaa duhkhee
na virakto na sangavaan.
na mumukshurna vaa muktaa
na kinchinnna cha kinchana..
18.97:
vikshepe'pi na vikshiptah
samaadhau na samaadhimaan.
yaad'ye'pi na jad'o dhanyah
paand'itye'pi na pand'itah..
18.98:
mukto yathaasthitisvasthah
kritakartavyanirvritah.
samah sarvatra vaitrishnyaanna
smaratyakritam kritam..
18.99:
na preeyate vandyamaano
nindyamaano na kupyati.
naivodvijati marane
yeevane naabhinandati..
18.100:
na dhaavati janaakeernam
naaranyam upashaantadheeh.
yathaatathaa yatratatra
sama evaavatisht'hate..
19.1:
janaka uvaacha-
tattvavijnyaanasandamsha-
maadaaya hridayodaraat.
naanaavidhaparaamarsha-
shalyoddhaarah krito mayaa..
19.2:
kva dharmah kva cha vaa kaamah
kva chaarthah kva vivekitaa.
kva dvaitam kva cha vaa'dvaitam
svamahimni sthitasya me..
19.3:
kva bhootam kva bhavishyad vaa
vartamaanamapi kva vaa.
kva deshah kva cha vaa nityam
svamahimni sthitasya me..
19.4:
kva chaatmaa kva cha vaanaatmaa
kva shubham kvaashubham tathaa.
kva chintaa kva cha vaachintaa
svamahimni sthitasya me..
19.5:
kva svapnah kva sushuptirvaa
kva cha jaagaranam tathaa.
kva turiyam bhayam vaapi
svamahimni sthitasya me..
19.6:
kva dooram kva sameepam vaa baahyam
kvaabhyantaram kva vaa.
kva sthoolam kva cha vaa sookshmam
svamahimni sthitasya me..
19.7:
kva mrityurjeevitam vaa kva lokaah
kvaasya kva laukikam.
kva layah kva samaadhirvaa
svamahimni sthitasya me..
19.8:
alam trivargakathayaa
yogasya kathayaapyalam.
alam vijnyaanakathayaa
vishraantasya mamaatmani..
20.1:
kva bhootaani kva deho vaa
kvendriyaani kva vaa manah.
kva shoonyam kva cha nairaashyam
matsvaroope niranjane..
20.2:
kva shaastram kvaatmavijnyaanam
kva vaa nirvishayam manah.
kva triptih kva vitrishnatvam
gatadvandvasya me sadaa..
20.3:
kva vidyaa kva cha vaavidyaa
kvaaham kvedam mama kva vaa.
kva bandha kva cha vaa mokshah
svaroopasya kva roopitaa..
20.4:
kva praarabdhaani karmaani
yeevanmuktirapi kva vaa.
kva tad videhakaivalyam
nirvisheshasya sarvadaa..
20.5:
kva kartaa kva cha vaa bhoktaa
nishkriyam sphuranam kva vaa.
kvaaparoksham phalam vaa kva
nihsvabhaavasya me sadaa..
20.6:
kva lokam kva mumukshurvaa
kva yogee jnyaanavaan kva vaa.
kva baddhah kva cha vaa muktah
svasvaroope'hamadvaye..
20.7:
kva srisht'ih kva cha samhaarah
kva saadhyam kva cha saadhanam.
kva saadhakah kva siddhirvaa
svasvaroope'hamadvaye..
20.8:
kva pramaataa pramaanam vaa
kva prameyam kva cha pramaa.
kva kinchit kva na kinchid
vaa sarvadaa vimalasya me..
20.9:
kva vikshepah kva chaikaagryam
kva nirbodhah kva mood'hataa.
kva harshah kva vishaado vaa
sarvadaa nishkriyasya me..
20.10:
kva chaisha vyavahaaro vaa
kva cha saa paramaarthataa.
kva sukham kva cha vaa dukham
nirvimarshasya me sadaa..
20.11:
kva maayaa kva cha samsaarah
kva preetirviratih kva vaa.
kva jeevah kva cha tadbrahma
sarvadaa vimalasya me..
20.12:
kva pravrittirnirvrittirvaa
kva muktih kva cha bandhanam.
koot'asthanirvibhaagasya
svasthasya mama sarvadaa..
20.13:
kvopadeshah kva vaa shaastram
kva shishyah kva cha vaa guruh.
kva chaasti purushaartho vaa
nirupaadheh shivasya me..
20.14:
kva chaasti kva cha vaa naasti
kvaasti chaikam kva cha dvayam.
bahunaatra kimuktena
kinchinnottisht'hate mama..
